the headliners for the 2011 Glastonbury Festival in England this summer. Glastonbury runs from June 22-26 and is expected to close out the final night of the weekend. We also argue very strongly that the things that we're doing are very pro-competitive, and I genuinely believe that, he said. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will oversee strategic projects.
